Subject: Confusion in battle
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

They all scatter as the shots come down on Radistor.

"Stop your assualt! He is Maximal. There was just a big confusion. Let
him leave, and we'll help you with repairs. There is need for further
combat," said Cleder.

Hot Rod looked up.
"Guys, I see two former Alliance bots. Meaning the NDE. It's Shockwave,
and my old friend Unitron. Watch them, they might attack."
